C01.title: JSON body is required
C01.description: The client provided no JSON body but the endpoint requires it.

C02.title: JSON schema validation failed
C02.description: The client provided a JSON body but it failed the schema validation.

C03.title: URL query parameters are required
C03.description: The client provided no URL query parameters but the endpoint requires them.

C04.title: URL query parameter validation failed
C04.description: The client provided URL query parameters but they failed the schema validation.

C05.title: Query not found
C05.description: The client is attempting to get information about a specific query but the provided query id does not exist.
C05.message: The provided Query ID does not exist
